function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven distribution of fact numbers for different properties in OpenKG-COVID19","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of data and potential bias in sampling","Mitigation":"Use stratified sampling or adjust sampling coefficients to ensure representative samples","Technologies":"Stratified sampling techniques, statistical analysis tools","People":"Researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Research team, data science team"},{"Description":"Discrepancies in labeling process","Impact":"Unreliable annotations and potential misrepresentation of data quality","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines for labeling and decision-making processes, consider additional rounds of review for ambiguous samples","Technologies":"Annotation management tools, consensus-building platforms","People":"Postgraduate students, annotators","Owner":"Research team, project lead"},{"Description":"Generalization of results to the entire data set without sufficient confidence","Impact":"Misleading conclusions and potential for misinterpretation of findings","Mitigation":"Compute confidence intervals, conduct hypothesis testing, assess statistical significance","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, hypothesis testing software","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"}]}
